Module MathUtils
Package mathUtils.linear

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
mathUtils.linear.Point
mathUtils.linear.Vector
public class Vector
extends Point
This class represents vectors from linear algebra. It can be used to calculate a vector's magnitude, the cross product between two vectors, as well as other known functions. Note that a vector behaves like a cartesian point, so it is also possible to rotate and scale vectors.
Since:
18.05.2020

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Vector()
    Constructs a vector with a magnitude of 0.
    Vector​(double x, double y, double z)
    Constructs a vector with the given coordinates.
    Vector​(Point p)
    Constructs a vector with the coordinates of the given point.

    Calculates the cross product between this vector and the given one.
    double dotProduct​(Vector v)
    Calculates the dot product between this vector and the given one.

    Multiplies this vector by given vectors' coordinates

    • Vector

      public Vector()
      Constructs a vector with a magnitude of 0.

    • Vector

      public Vector​(double x, double y, double z)
      Constructs a vector with the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate
      y - The y-coordinate
      z - The z-coordinate

    • Vector

      public Vector​(Point p)
      Constructs a vector with the coordinates of the given point.
      Parameters:
      p - The point whose coordinates should be copied

  • Method Details

    • magnitude

      public double magnitude()
      Calculates this vector's magnitude (the distance to the origin (0, 0, 0). It is identical to:
      this.distanceTo(0, 0, 0)
      Returns:
      The magnitude in double precision

    • add

      public void add​(Vector... vectors)
      Adds given vectors' coordinates to this vector
      Parameters:
      vectors - The vectors to be added

    • subtract

      public void subtract​(Vector... vectors)
      Subtracts given vectors' coordinates from this vector
      Parameters:
      vectors - The vectors to subtract

    • multiply

      public void multiply​(Vector... vectors)
      Multiplies this vector by given vectors' coordinates
      Parameters:
      vectors - The vectors to multiply by

    • normalize

      public void normalize()
      normalizes this vector (reduces it to a magnitude of 1)

    • dotProduct

      public double dotProduct​(Vector v)
      Calculates the dot product between this vector and the given one.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector
      Returns:
      The scalar in double precision

    • crossProduct

      public Vector crossProduct​(Vector v)
      Calculates the cross product between this vector and the given one.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector
      Returns:
      A vector that is perpendicular to both vectors

    • angleTo

      public double angleTo​(Vector v)
      Calculates the angle between this vector and the given one. Identical to:
      new Vector().angleBetween(this, v)
      Parameters:
      v - The vector
      Returns:
      The angle (in degrees)
